Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
TCS have some amazing opportunities for you to get involved in this Summer!
SIGN UP TO THESE OPPORTUNITIES NOW!
Get involved this summer in a range of opportunities from attending London Youth Games to being an Associate Mentor on our Summer Programme!
HOUNSLOW AND EALING YOUTH BOARD
Presenting Mindfulness, learn how to manage stress and learn about mental health, with activities such as plant-potting and sewing.
CLICK TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST!
SUTTON AND MERTON YOUTH BOARD
Presenting Share the Shelter, with a grad reunion! Reunite with your old teams and engage in fun activities, with the cause of homelessness.
CLICK TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST!
REGIONAL YOUTH BOARD
Presenting Humans of London, how socially integrated is London? Get involved and find out!
CLICK TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST!
WANDSWORTH, RICHMOND AND KINGSTON YOUTH BOARD
Presenting mental health awareness, learn more about mental health issues for teenagers in this interactive fun filled day.
CLICK TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST!
LONDON YOUTH GAMES 2016
Sign up to volunteer at the London Youth games this year and help run the day!
CLICK TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST!
BITE THE BALLOT DECAFE
Sky Entertainment are opening their doors to NCS Grads! Come along on the 6th April to check out a day in the life of Sky!
CLICK TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST!
BE A DRAGON ON OUR NCS SUMMER PROGRAMME
Join us this summer and be a dragon to the next generation of young people to award them money for their social action projects!
CLICK TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST!
BE AN ASSOCIATE MENTOR THIS SUMMER
Online applications for Associate Mentors have now gone live! Be a part of NCS this summer and apply now!
CLICK TO APPLY NOW!
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
